author: huyenltnguyen
message:
feat(curriculum): add content to the 4 new certs (#62659)

Co-authored-by: Oliver Eyton-Williams <ojeytonwilliams@gmail.com>
Co-authored-by: moT01 <20648924+moT01@users.noreply.github.com>
